data.title: spacy-wordnet
data.description: `spacy-wordnet` creates annotations that easily allow the use of WordNet and [WordNet Domains](http://wndomains.fbk.eu/) by using the [NLTK WordNet interface](http://www.nltk.org/howto/wordnet.html)
code_example: # Load a spaCy model (supported languages are "es" and "en")
# WordNet object links spaCy token with NLTK WordNet interface by giving access to
# And automatically add info about WordNet domains
data.author: recognai
